PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2010-01012010-02-02INDUSTRY,  ,  ,  ,  , 
ActCompetition Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Notifiable Transactions Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the NOTIFIABLE TRANSACTIONS REGULATIONS in order to reflect legislative changes to the Competition Act passed in the Budget Implementation Act, 2009 in March 2009; namely changes to the form of merger notification. The Regulations are also being amended in order to update section numbers modified as a result of previous amendments to the Act made in 1999 and to reduce the amount of information that parties to a proposed transaction must supply, to reduce the paperwork burden on businesses.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2010-0022 Publication Date: 2010-02-17
